subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Cotto, who has a fight against Saúl Álvarez scheduled for Saturday, was stripped of his middleweight title because he had not agreed to the W.B.C.’s rules, it said.
snippet: Cotto, who has a fight against Saúl Álvarez scheduled for Saturday, was stripped of his middleweight title because he had not agreed to the W.B.C.’s rules, it said.
